speaker: Devin Becker
words: And there we go with that. This could be a good set up.

speaker: Rae Armantrout
words: Mostly poetry. I write poetry and teach poetry.

speaker: DB
words: How has the computer changed your writing process over the years?

speaker: RA
words: Well, I started writing on a typewriter, then moved to computers in the 90s. The revision process became much easier with word processors.
